name: INSetClimateSettingsInCarIntent
desc: A request to change the climate settings in a CarPlay-enabled vehicle.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(enableFan: Bool?, enableAirConditioner: Bool?, enableClimateControl: Bool?, enableAutoMode: Bool?, airCirculationMode: INCarAirCirculationMode, fanSpeedIndex: Int?, fanSpeedPercentage: Double?, relativeFanSpeedSetting: INRelativeSetting, temperature: Measurement<UnitTemperature>?, relativeTemperatureSetting: INRelativeSetting, climateZone: INCarSeat, carName: INSpeakableString?)
items.desc: Creates the intent object with the specified climate settings information.

items.name: var carName: INSpeakableString?
items.desc: A name that identifies the userâ€™s car.

items.name: var enableClimateControl: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to turn on the climate control system.

items.name: var enableAutoMode: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to enable automatic mode for the climate control system.

items.name: var airCirculationMode: INCarAirCirculationMode
items.desc: The air circulation mode for the climate control system.

items.name: var temperature: Measurement<UnitTemperature>?
items.desc: The specific temperature to set for the climate control system.

items.name: var climateZone: INCarSeat
items.desc: The seat position to have its climate settings modified.

items.name: var enableFan: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to turn on the cabin fan system.

items.name: var fanSpeedIndex: Int?
items.desc: An integer value indicating the desired fan speed position.

items.name: var fanSpeedPercentage: Double?
items.desc: A floating-point value indicating the requested fan speed specified as a percentage of the maximum speed.

items.name: var enableAirConditioner: Bool?
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether to turn on the air conditioner system.
